entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getting command line via diagnostic pipe GetProcessInfo command during suspension only reports process name #59439
  • Http client certificate authorization Issue in .NET 5 in Docker #59435
  • .NET 6 static abstract interface members in combination with static members fail with a MissingMethodException #59432
    6.0.0
  • Is ALPN support in OpenSSL a required feature? #59431
  • Standalone JIT build #59426
  • JSON src-gen fast-path does not consider writer Encoder option #59424
    7.0.0
  • Make `mono` CSP Compliant #59416
  • Cannot change the ReadOnly file attribute #59406
  • Paging, MemoryMappedFile and GC fun #59405
    Future
  • Blazor - Safari Ipad - RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #59407
    7.0.0
  • How to implement Stream nowadays? #59403
  • Perf regressions in Perf_Matrix benchmarks #59415
    6.0.0
  • Regression in QuickSortSpan / Perf_Integer.ToByteArray benchmark #59414
  • System.Speech.Tests fail GrammarBuilder test on non-English OS #59400
  • WinForms published with PublishTrimmed option causes a Trojan/Generic.ASMalwS.3487958 detection by virustotal.com #59398
  • DacDbiInterfaceImpl::IsModuleMapped returns S_FALSE without setting *isModuleMapped #59393
    7.0.0
  • SkipUseReferenceAssembly=true in ProjectReference is giving VS trouble to resolve some APIs #59390

Closed

  • OperatingSystem.IsWindowsVersionAtLeast and SupportedOSPlatformAttribute using different version numbers for older Windows #59433
  • [net6.0][BlazorWasmSdk] build does not link native files #56783
    6.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest creates many connections #59207
    7.0.0
  • Consider Uri .ctor to allow for paths starting with \\?\ #58712
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Http3RequestStream.BufferFrameEnvelope null reference error #57619
    7.0.0
  • Inconsistent Regex matching behavior in InvariantCulture #58956
    Future
  • Inconsist behavior when deserialize class and struct with text.json #59394
  • HTTP/3: SocketsHttpHandler.ConnectCallback #48617
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext weird behavior #59344
  • Do not use `Handle...` for private helpers that are not msquic callbacks, e.g.: runtime/src/libraries/System.Net.Quic/src/System/Net/Quic/Implementations/MsQuic/MsQuicStream.cs Line 383 in 4d41173 private void HandleWriteCompletedState() #59418
    7.0.0
  • Test Failure Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\GlobalInstance\\GlobalInstanceMarshallingTestsBuiltInComDisabled\\GlobalInstanceMarshallingTestsBuiltInComDisabled.cmd #59072
    7.0.0
  • `SlimSemaphore.WaitAsync` throws wrong exception type on cancellation before waiting #59402
  • System.Uri constructor returns an object that does is not equal to the input #56482
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] transform.c: Unimplemented opcode: ee at 0x0 #54372
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Method not found System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncodeUtf8 happening in Xamarin.Android #56544
    Future
  • Regression in Utf8ParserTests #59094
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix gtCloneExpr when cloning during R2R compilation a GT_ALLOCOBJ node #59438
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59436
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix regression in Regex lowercasing in parser #59434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Set *isMapped to false to satisfy 'out' semantics #59430
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Update to latest .NET 5 SDK #59428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Revert "Fix incorrect handling of character range and capitalization … #59425
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Fix concurrent access to cache. #59423
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59422
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix gtCloneExpr when cloning during R2R compilation a GT_ALLOCOBJ node #59421
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • We should not call distribute_free_regions at the end of background GC #59413
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix concurrent access to cache. #59412
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix brick table issue due to race condition in adjust_limit_clr #59411
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Split install_location to file-per-architecture #59404
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix QuotedNumbers_Deserialize test on non-English OS #59399
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [mono][wasm] Rework the handling of GC references in AOTed code. #59397
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] Enable System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests #59396
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, disabled-test
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc improvements #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • XmlSerializer support for IsDynamicCodeSupported=false #59386
    area-Serialization

Merged

  • [release/6.0-rc2] [interp] Disable optimization if the var index is greater than G_MAXUINT16 #59261
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Fixing memory corruption #59420
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix issues where the module index GUID table isn't properly computed #59377
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Generic Math Preview - Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59349
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • Delete a legacy local for arm32. #59380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59285
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [interp] Add wide data item index static load and stores #59262
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [MonoVM] Reduce P/Invoke GC transition asserts in release builds #59269
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing memory corruption #59419
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #59258
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net
  • Release 6.0 rc2 localized manifest #59379
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Fix NullReferenceException on Timeout when streaming request body #59204
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix issues where the module index GUID table isn't properly computed #59375
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [unix x86] Fix GCMemoryInfoData size assertion #59417
    community-contribution
  • Update Unloadability documentation #59383
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix gtCloneExpr when cloning during R2R compilation a GT_ALLOCOBJ node #59395
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Work around for forbidden "Roslyn4.0" in test name on Android #59281
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [main] [Release/6.0]fix the package version for non-shipping csproj packages #59388
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [x86/Linux] Fix SIGSEGV on Debugger.Break() during debugging. #59350
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Reverting the old behavior of scope id numeration #59372
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #59410
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix crossgen for FreeBSD by adding FreeBSD RID. #59331
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix invalid parsing of not unicode Uri #59252
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Listener Comment #59365
    area-System.Net
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Don't assert when encountering invalid IL opcode #59334
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Rework the handling of GC references in AOTed code. #59352
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Enable experimental nuget retry on rc2 lanes (already enabled on main) #59360
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Reverting the old behavior of scope id numeration #59368
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Release/6.0]fix the package version for non-shipping csproj packages #59369
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59238
    area-codeflow
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Generic Math Preview - Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59366
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Add a note about rerunning the license/cla check #59440
    area-Meta
  • Move clang-format download into dotnet/runtime and add docs for setting up auto-formatting in the repository #59374
    area-Infrastructure
  • Port DllImportGenerator to dotnet/runtime #59363
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update xunit version on release branch #59277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Check if External Object Context is still active after a possible GC #59293
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59338
    area-System.IO
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add notes about not calling src-gen APIs directly and make them non-browsable #59385
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • Improve ReliabilityFramework #59384
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • [testing] Add retry configuration and temporary test #59381
  • Disable more SendPacketsElement tests on Win11 #59359
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Update xunit version on dotnet/runtime #59275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • LoggerMessage formatter performance improvements #58524
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu #58987
  • Update libraries helix matrix #58637
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix xmldoc of TypeGenerationSpec #59361
    documentation, area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in VersionConverter #55564
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fail ToLogFont_Invoke tests on non English Windows #59328
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area owners to include new owners of S.DS.* #59357
    area-Meta
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Replace remaining SRM regex usage of Tuple with ValueTuples #1540
  • Decide what to do with SRM regex Deserialize/Serialize #1536

Updated

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: SSA for branching #1404
  • GenericStructConstraintPropertiesTest fails in NativeAOT #1563

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Regex DGML code to be debug-only #1585
  • Make BDDAlgebra lock reads too #1584

Merged

  • Update link to "Flexible HTTP proposal" #1177
  • Adds HttpClient LLHTTP handler #1038
  • Simplify integration of NonBacktracking into Regex #1582

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Library Packs for Optional Workloads do not have `.msi.<arch>` packages #21227
  • Give a complete option of download link in release notes #21214

Closed

  • Maui: Workload installation failed: The transaction has aborted #19739
    6.0.1xx
  • After install 6.0 Preview 7 on Mac OS, install workload maui using command line failed. #19822
    6.0.1xx
  • help usage text missing workload #21009
    6.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation missing for .NET 6 RC1 #21167

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1376861 #21247
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1376573 #21243
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always reference .NET Framework reference assembly packages if using static GraphWithoutRuntimeDependencies #21236
    Area-External
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Switch to 1ES Servicing pools in 3.1.4xx #21232
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES Servicing pools in 3.1.1xx #21233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update top level help with workload string #21177
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController dependency #20984
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #19229
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx-rc2' => 'main' #21192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make workload descriptions localizable #21189
    Area-Workloads
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #21022
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK
  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
    Area-Install

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    Backlog
  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Event hookup in object initializer #5176
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typos #5210
  • Correct formatting of generic type name in LDM notes #5209

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload does not work for dynamic types #56592
  • Unexpected ref safety errors when an uninitialized local is used as an `out` argument #56587
  • De-duplicate loc strings across Roslyn #56585
  • String interpolation + LangVersion=10.0 + out parameters results in CS1615 #56579
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString does not use fully qualified names for default enum parameter values #56573
  • Roslyn should move our VSPackage code to be servicehub based #56568

Closed

  • CS1591: Redundant comments are required in all partial method definitions #54103
    17.0
  • Compilation with module initializer fails #56572
  • Source generator doesn't have access to MSBuild metadata when items have '..' in path #52034
    17.0
  • Diagnostic analyzer runner is unavailable on NetCore OOP #56254
    17.0
  • IManagedHotReloadLanguageService.GetUpdatesAsync should return a syntax error in diagnostics. #55833
    17.0
  • Roslyn components should support versioning #54108
    17.0
  • Missing warning for non-exhaustive switch-expression #52714
    17.0
  • Typo in EditorConfig UI ("carrage return") #56558
  • 'ExtractMethodCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #50923
    17.0
  • High memory consumption durign building EntityFramework project. #56576

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test to ensure completion won't trigger execution of source generator #56593
    Area-IDE
  • Add comment on usage of SLocalRegistry service on background thread #56591
    Area-IDE
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Fix crash lowering property pattern where override lacks a get accessor #56586
    Area-Compilers
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Revert "Avoid switching to UI thread in some option persisters" #56580
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56570
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to object #56567
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0

Merged

  • Merge 17.1-preview1 into 17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56589
    Area-IDE, auto-merge
  • Fix partial method doc comments #56419
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56202
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement capabilities changed handler #56584
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to dev17.1-preview1 #56560
    Area-IDE
  • Backport 56569 to 17.0 #56583
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix DefaultAnalyzerAssemblyLoader #56357
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Don't skip suppressors with /skipAnalyzers #54969
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Enable nullable analysis in some parts of the code #56578
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • EnC/HR interface unification #56424
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, 17.0
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56577
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56575
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56574
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56557
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Only produce suppressions/config for the normal priority group. #56569
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56571
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid switching to UI thread in some option persisters #56553
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56565
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Create misc files workspace for LSP #56314
    Area-IDE
  • Guard against updates with no type changes #56443
    Area-IDE
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Enable async lightbulbs by default #56551
    Area-IDE
  • Set CompilerApiVersion in Microsoft.Managed.Core.targets #56460
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Unify code for pragma placements #56285
    Area-IDE
  • Fix formatting of overload with new #56554
    Area-IDE
  • When "assigned", a `discard` doesn't escape out of the current expression. #56564
    Area-Compilers
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE
  • Add more tests around case sensitivity and project reference conversion #56490
    Area-IDE
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Clean up loc strings #56559
    Area-IDE
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Method type inference should make inference from explicit lambda return type #56534
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • 🐇 Optimize detection of generated code analysis flags #53935
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VSCode: Razor implicit/explicit expressions in HTML attributes are not colored properly #36822
  • Razor VSCode `?` commit char conflicts with `??` Null Coalescing Operator #36821
  • Both flavors of webapi project should use Swashbuckle defaults #36819
    6.0-rc2
  • Improve Blazor Server Logging for the Long Polling Transport #36817
    6.0.0
  • Add a CaptureStartupErrors overload with RequestDelegate. #36815
  • BlazorWasm IdentityServer fetch rejects clients in Production #36812
    6.0.0
  • Blazor, methods not called after moving to another page, no errors in console also #36811
  • [Discussion] Announcement: TryParse and BindAsync discovery on Map* parameters will throw for invalid methods #36810
    Discussions
  • SignalR Karma test issues warning about deprecated API #36809
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Access violation in cleaning up transport in connection_impl::stop_connection() #36808
    6.0.0
  • signalr::websocket_transport’s start()'s lambda captures the transport as a shared_ptr #36807
    6.0.0
  • Asp.Net Core Identity - request canceled when getting back to `signin-google` ... Only sometimes #36806
  • Explore removing inline module script for Blazor Wasm #36805
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Chrome (93) Disconnect SignalR Connection Exactly After 5 Minutes #36801
  • New Project Dialog in VS2022: Language filter dropdown should NOT contain Angular/React/Vue #36800
  • Component script not being copied to _content folder #36795
  • JS SignalR - HubConnection - Ability to unregister callbacks for connection states. #36793
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Startup regression: mvc #36790
  • Perf regression: json #36789
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 6 RC 2, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6 RC 2 #aspnetcore-109796-.NET6RC2 #36777

Closed

  • Language server ProjectSnapshotManagerDispatcher doesn't teardown dedicated thread when parent server is disposed. #36788
    17.0-Preview5
  • Cancel TagHelper resolution on solution close #36692
    17.0-Preview5
  • 404 when running blazorwasm -ho not in Development #36814
  • Create 6.0 SiteExtensions package #35430
    6.0-rc2
  • Use containers for all Linux builds and tests #22788
  • Automate updates of partner packages #13586
  • [release/2.1] Clean up `E_FAIL` compilation errors #30760
  • .tools\msbuild\16.5.0-alpha\tools\MSBuild\Microsoft \VC\v160\\Microsoft.Cpp.Default.props" is correct, and that the file exists on disk Not work for me ? #22951
  • Azure stdoutLogFile default value causes startup failure 500.31 ANCM Failed to Find Native Dependencies #36749
  • CancellationTokenSource's are leaked on solution close / open #36787
    17.0-Preview5
  • whitespace between parameters in the request can not match the route template #30661
    Discussions
  • Startup regression: mvc #36670
  • .razor components produce an unfixable warning when using @implements or @inherits with a generic type #32733
    6.0.0
  • CSP for Blazor #34428
    6.0.0
  • CVE-2021-26701 security error with System.Text.Encodings.Web dependency #36748
  • Unable to deploy web app using MSBuild #36686
  • Task.Delay/Task.Yield Results in Unresponsive Blazor Application on Callback (`@onclick`) #36799
  • Test failure: SignalR.Npm.FunctionalTests #36780
  • parallel.For in blazor #36804
  • Import SCSS file from NuGet package's '_content/<<library>>/' #36604
  • Blazor Wasm Hosted Dockerized not working in debug mode #36742
  • Race condition with component using @ref for cascading value to another component ? #36693
  • Blazor WebAssembly - How can I add a new *.razor page that don't need to recompile or build the project #36704
  • [blazor] Can nuget packages that enables p2p be supported in blazor? is it possible for now? #36741
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps #36531
  • Make some lines un-aligned in "FetchData.razor" file in Bazor Server project, select the lines and select "Format Selection", the format is not correct. #29645
    17.0-Preview5
  • Rename "DelegateEndpoint" types #36553
    6.0-rc2
  • If Razor diagnostics publishing fails it can crash VS #36774
    17.0-Preview5
  • CSS error does not get remapped properly #36556
    17.0-Preview5
  • Error: Failed to start the connection: Error: None of the transports supported by the client are supported by the server #36775
    6.0.0
  • Components that mirror HTML elements don't auto-close correctly. #36568
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Include system crash dumps in artifacts #36824
    area-infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES R&D Pools on main #36820
    area-infrastructure
  • Add MapPatch API to endpointRouteBuilderExtensions #36818
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use Swagger defaults in web API controllers template #36816
    area-mvc, feature-templates, feature-minimal-actions
  • Bump tmpl from 1.0.4 to 1.0.5 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #36784
    area-signalr, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Update sdk to 6.0.100-rc.2.21470.55 #36783
    area-infrastructure
  • Update sdk to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21470.6 #36781
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Always use latest targeting packs #36718
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Parse date types into UTC by default #36762
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [6.0-rc2] Fix DatabaseDeveloperPageExceptionFilter to handle wrapped DbExceptions #36803
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Blazor Stop Requiring `unsafe-inline` in CSP #36771
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, blazor-server, 7.0-preview1
  • Upgrade Karma/Sauce-related packages to fix #36780 #36802
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update sdk to 6.0.100-rtm.21466.6 #36785
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Rename and consolidate "DelegateEndpoint" types #36768
    7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Blazor Server Add Console Error if Long Polling #36764
    area-blazor
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36657
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `EventSource` should mention some built-in types require special handling #2608
  • SOS bpmd command on Main can stop twice #2607
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate ProcessInfo is same (except entrypoint) before and after resume. #2603

Updated

  • Add interface level testing using test asset packages #2595

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] Mixed developments use native language #2624
  • [Bug] Image is not always displayed when HeightRequest in not set on Android #2623
  • [Bug] Not able to correctly install and use MAUI on Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 #2620
  • Use iOS SDK's Font Registration instead of Resizetizer's #2617
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Bug] Unable to change App Icon in IOS iPad #2616
  • [Enhancement] A view similar to the WPF and UWP ContentControl #2611

Closed

  • [Spec] Implement Device class functionality to Core #1305
  • [Enhancement] Why are so many classes prefixed with Maui when namespaces are a thing? #2618
  • dotnet workload install maui - fails #2037
  • [Bug] [WinUI] NavigationBar does not disappear when HasNavigationBar set to false. #2450
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Navigation Page has no back button. #2435
  • [Bug] Line X and Y values don't redraw when set programmaticly. #2465
  • [Bug] Polyline doesn't redraw when given new points programmatically. #2464
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Updating Grid Margin followed by Padding causes Layout cycle error, crashes app. #2444
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Bug] Grid ColumnDefinition and RowDefinition do not reset when setting collection with new values. #2545
    6.0.101-preview.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove IBoxView #2619
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #2613
    do-not-merge
  • Update ScrollView Content update methods to handle null content #2612
    6.0.101-preview.9

Merged

  • [android] use a custom Resource.designer.cs #2606
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431
  • Remove previewer's hooks #2348
  • WinUI navigation view #2551
  • [Core] Fix issue invalidating shapes #2615
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix layout cycle on Windows when ScrollView content has Margin #2572
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • Reset internal list for row/column defs when updating them; #2608
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • Add SupportedOSPlatformVersion #2565
  • Updated the BuildForLegacy Build prop for Comet #2607
  • Removing Reloadify ##2524 #2603
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2610
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [WIP] Spike using interfaces and shared mappers to achieve ImageButton #2352
  • Use Essentials over the old Device class #2488
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Android TabbedPageHandler #2432
  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038
  • Border control #2445
  • Port Editor.HorizontalTextAlignment to Handler #840
  • Implement Keyboard property in WinUI Entry #1554
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 6.x - Split Query Incorrectly Causes Buffering #26129
  • FromRawSql should throw when Discriminator is not included in the result set #26124
  • Support dynamic aggregates (Entity–component–system) #26123

Closed

  • Update exception message when correlated collection cannot be projected #24490
    6.0.0
  • Upgrade to .Net 6 throws "System.ArgumentNullException : Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'provider')" #26122
  • Migration keeps adding columns #24275
    6.0.0
  • dotnet-ef requires x64 SDK on macOS Monterey with Apple Silicon (M1) #25927
  • Documentation is missing information on how to set up database users and rights #26126
  • Allow skip navigations for 1-1 #20552
  • Add API to configure all Owned type instances to OwnedEntityTypeBuilder #14047
  • MAUI preview 4 does not work with EF Core, any version #25080
  • BUG: AccessViolationException when Garbage Collection occurs while reading from Sqlite #21469
  • What is the recommended way to do DDD Value Objects in EF Core? #26065
  • Migration fails when adding a check constraint on a second owned entity #23399
    6.0.0
  • Exception mapping keyless and keyed entity type to same table/view #19257
    5.0.0
  • Incorrect migration created for nested owned collection without model changes #23493
    6.0.0
  • Different value generation strategies on Owned Entity Types #20740
    6.0.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Improve exception message for a shadow skip navigation #26128
  • [6.0] Tools: Warn/error when using new features on old runtimes #26127
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26125
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [6.0] Fix to #24490 - Update exception message when correlated collection cannot be projected #26079
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.20.1 to 3.21.0 #26001
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26110
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update the entity type on check constraints when it's converted to a STET #26112

Updated

  • [6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Also try the .NET 5+ ApplicationData API #26114
  • [6.0] Code cleanup on EFCore project #26100
